analysis.description:
ElecAirdrop.multisend (/unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol#375-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_tokenAddr).transferFrom(msg.sender,dests[i],values[i]) (/unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol)

ElecAirdrop.multisend has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(_tokenAddr).transferFrom(msg.sender,dests[i],values[i]) (/unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenAddr' of ElecAirdrop.multisend (/unique_chucks/5/0x922f89af2a2af5e43dec770398ac539b76e8a91b.sol) is not in mixedCase
